title: Haunted Maokai
body:
well I've just started playing maokai and i seem to have become a "addict" of him and i really badly want to know if this skin will be able to purchase soon, maybe in the upcoming harrowing? The other skins are okay but i would really love that skin or the festive one

replies.body: personally i like the soccer one the best
yeah its cool but the other ones seem better
awesome!! ill pick that one up for sure
